info_CN: 减论Agent通过算法为您推荐
南洋理工大学与字节跳动种子联合推出了 Puppeteer 方法
该方法通过自回归 transformer 预测骨骼结构、基于注意力机制推断蒙皮权重
并结合可微分优化动画流水线
实现了多样化 3D 模型的自动绑定与高保真动画生成
a comprehensive framework that automatically rigs and animates diverse 3D objects by predicting skeletal structures with an auto-regressive transformer
inferring skinning weights through an attention-based architecture with topology-aware joint attention
and generating animations via a differentiable optimization-based pipeline
